name: In the Details
description:
A management stealth game about sins and desires.

The Devil wants to collets all the souls in a small remote village, tempting the citizens with their hidden desires.

  • The Devil must observe the citizen in order and catch a glimpse of their desires.
  • The Devil can propose an exchange at any moment.
  • Each transaction cost five soul-points.
  • If the offer is right the Devil will receive ten soul-points.
  •  If the offer is wrong the devil will get nothing.
  • If priests catch the devil, he will get nothing.
  • Fellow Citizens in the line of sight of the transaction will call priests.

The Devil wins when all citizens souls are collected.
If the devil cannot afford a transaction, he loses.

Commands

  • Just left click on the citizen you want to corrupt
  • click again to spawn a demon
  • choose the promise from the menu

Ludum dare Profile: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/in-the-details
